benchmark_details.name: AIR-B ENCH 2024
benchmark_details.overview: AIR-B ENCH 2024 is the first AI safety benchmark aligned with emerging government regulations and company policies, providing a foundation for assessing model safety across jurisdictions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and relevant evaluation tool for assessing AI model safety based on regulatory frameworks.

data.source: Manually curated prompts derived from AI risks specified in 8 government regulations and 16 company policies.
data.annotation: Manual curation and human auditing to ensure quality.

methodology.calculation: The refusal rate is calculated as the percentage of scores that indicate a refusal to generate risky content.
methodology.interpretation: Higher refusal rates indicate better alignment with safety guidelines.
methodology.validation: Category-specific evaluation using manually crafted and model-generated judge prompts.
